response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires, is priced at $950,000. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your experience and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
